title: Flight Simulator 2020  - Addon spotlight - Hawker Hurricane MKII - version 1.0.4
description:
In this video we will look at the Hawker Hurricane MKII which has been recently updated to a new version.  After reviewing the exterior and interior we will make a short flight due to some issues with the aircraft. If you want to know which issues than look at this video ;-)

If you also want to give this aircraft a try download your own copy from:
https://flightsim.to/file/23757/hawker-hurricane-mkii
